languages.text: {n}Хоть тон вожака Волков и грозен, но вы замечаете хитрую искорку в его взгляде. В отличие от яростно рычащего Ульфара.{/n}
{n}The Wolf leader's tone may be threatening, but you notice a sly glint in his eye. Ulfar, on the other hand, is growling furiously, with no matching twinkle in his gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хоть тон вожака Волков и грозен, но вы замечаете хитрую искорку в его взгляде. В отличие от яростно рычащего Ульфара.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Wolf leader's tone may be threatening, but you notice a sly glint in his eye. Ulfar, on the other hand, is growling furiously, with no matching twinkle in his gaze.{/n}
{n}The Wolf leader's tone may be threatening, but you notice a sly glint in his eye. Ulfar, on the other hand, is growling furiously, with no matching twinkle in his gaze.{/n}
{n}The Wolf leader's tone may be threatening, but you notice a sly glint in his eye. Ulfar, on the other hand, is growling furiously, with no matching twinkle in his gaze.{/n}
{n}The Wolf leader's tone may be threatening, but you notice a sly glint in his eye. Ulfar, on the other hand, is growling furiously, with no matching twinkle in his gaze.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管狼群首领的语气充满了威胁的意味，但你却注意到，他的眼中闪烁着狡黠的光芒。而另一方面，尽管乌尔法正愤怒地咆哮着，但目光中却并没有应有的怒火。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf leader's tone may be threatening, but you notice a sly glint in his eye. Ulfar, on the other hand, is growling furiously, with no matching twinkle in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管狼群首领的语气充满了威胁的意味，但你却注意到，他的眼中闪烁着狡黠的光芒。而另一方面，尽管乌尔法正愤怒地咆哮着，但目光中却并没有应有的怒火。{/n}

languages.text: {n}狼のリーダーの口調は脅迫的だが、その目は狡猾な光を放っていることに気づく。対照的にウルファーは、輝く眼差しとは不釣り合いな、憤怒のうなり声を発している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf leader's tone may be threatening, but you notice a sly glint in his eye. Ulfar, on the other hand, is growling furiously, with no matching twinkle in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}狼のリーダーの口調は脅迫的だが、その目は狡猾な光を放っていることに気づく。対照的にウルファーは、輝く眼差しとは不釣り合いな、憤怒のうなり声を発している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El tono del Lobo líder puede resultar amenazante, pero adviertes un brillo travieso en su mirada. Ulfar, por su parte, gruñe enfurecido, sin rastro de tal fulgor en sus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf leader's tone may be threatening, but you notice a sly glint in his eye. Ulfar, on the other hand, is growling furiously, with no matching twinkle in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El tono del Lobo líder puede resultar amenazante, pero adviertes un brillo travieso en su mirada. Ulfar, por su parte, gruñe enfurecido, sin rastro de tal fulgor en sus ojos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bien que le ton du chef des Loups semble menaçant, vous remarquez une lueur malicieuse dans son regard. Ulfar, en revanche, bouillonne d'une rage non feinte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf leader's tone may be threatening, but you notice a sly glint in his eye. Ulfar, on the other hand, is growling furiously, with no matching twinkle in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que le ton du chef des Loups semble menaçant, vous remarquez une lueur malicieuse dans son regard. Ulfar, en revanche, bouillonne d'une rage non feinte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Ton des Anführers der Wölfe mag bedrohlich klingen, aber du bemerkst ein leicht schelmisches Funkeln in seinem Blick. Ulfar hingegen knurrt zornig und meint es offensichtlich völlig ernst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf leader's tone may be threatening, but you notice a sly glint in his eye. Ulfar, on the other hand, is growling furiously, with no matching twinkle in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Ton des Anführers der Wölfe mag bedrohlich klingen, aber du bemerkst ein leicht schelmisches Funkeln in seinem Blick. Ulfar hingegen knurrt zornig und meint es offensichtlich völlig ernst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kurt liderinin ses tonu tehditkâr olabilir ama gözlerinde sinsi bir parıltı olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Diğer yandan Ulfar, öfkeyle kükrüyor ve bakışlarında öyle bir parıltıdan eser yok.{/n}
